name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OzLINK Mobile Pro Feature Check Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this tool to generate a list of OzLINK Mobile Pro features supported by your Netsuite account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Login to Netsuite.
2. From any Netsuite page, run the OzLINK Mobile Pro Feature Check Tool.
3. It is recommended that you disable this extension when you are not using it.
